#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<map>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>
 
#define MAX 500000000
#define LL 1000000
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,l,a,b,an,am;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    { an=0;
      am=0;
      cin>>a>>b>>l;
      /* 
      for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
      printf("%d",l);
      .....................
      ....................
      .....................
      .....................
      .........................
      ......................
      
      */
      l=l%(a+b);
      if(l>0 && l<=a)
      cout<<"Aman"<<endl;
      else
      cout<<"Anish"<<endl;
    }
   return 0; 
}
